name: VTransparency 3.0
body:
### What is GitHub?

> A code sharing and publishing system  
> A social network for programmers  
> A version control system  
> A file management and sharing system  

### Your Daily Tasks

- Create things
- Save things
- Edit things
- Save the thing __again__

It's this continuous editing and updating of the file which is the key benefit of GitHub.

GitHub allows you to store a note along with each save, giving you space to write a brief summary of the changes. Maybe you just corrected spelling mistakes, but you may have also made a major revision that you want to record.

![time and versons](time-and-versions.png)

This is easy for a single file and a single individual, but when it comes to collaborating on the same files it becomes difficult.

![collaborative](collaborative-tracking.PNG)

GitHub's version control system easily handles this interleaving of multiple people working on the same file.

* GitHub is a *fast and modern* implementation of __version control.__
* GitHub provides a __history__ of content changes.
* GitHub facilitates __collaborative changes__ to files.
* GitHub is easy to use for any type of __knowledge worker.__
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
